job_description.title: Senior Backend Engineer
job_description.description:
We're looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join our core platform team. You'll architect and build the systems that power our AI-driven analytics platform used by 500+ enterprise customers processing 10B+ events daily.

You'll work closely with the CTO, lead technical decisions, mentor junior engineers, and have significant autonomy in choosing technologies and approaches. This is a high-impact role where your work directly affects product reliability and customer satisfaction.

requirements.education_level: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

responsibilities: Design and implement core platform APIs
Optimize database queries and system performance
Collaborate with product team on feature scoping

evaluation_context.notes: High weighting on Capability (25%) and Reward (25%) because we need someone who can lead technical decisions and has high upside. Lower weight on Compensation (5%) because we're willing to pay top-of-market for the right candidate.
